keycard_l1.name: Level 1 Keycard
keycard_l1.description: A standard issue Level 1 keycard. It looks like it could open some basic doors.

coffee_cup.name: Stained Coffee Cup
coffee_cup.description: A cold, half-empty coffee cup with the Foundation logo on it. The coffee inside looks like tar.

broom.name: Broom
broom.description: A dusty old broom leaning against the wall. It doesn't look very useful.

terminal.name: Security Terminal
terminal.description: The screen is shattered and dark. It's completely useless.

cot.name: Hard Cot
cot.description: A simple metal frame with a thin, uncomfortable mattress. This is where you sleep.
